EmailTemplate.name: 02-02-23 P&N Atmia Email to ISOs.P&N Atmia ISOs Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: NCR at ATMIA: Visit Your Partner in ATM Program Management
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Kahuna ATM Solutions, Columbus Data Services (CDS) and LibertyX invite you to visit us in the NCR booth, #102, and explore all the ways we can help your ATM business succeed. We help independent businesses in the ATM industry achieve more profitability. Whether you operate a few dozen or a few thousand locations, we’re here to help. - Proven, reliable transaction processing - LibertyX bitcoin sales at the ATM - Allpoint Network transaction driving - ATM hardware, software and accessory sales - Cash assistance, service delivery Backed by NCR, the world’s leading ATM manufacturer and service provider, we can elevate your ATM business and help you achieve your vision of success. See you in New Orleans! Your NCR Team <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
